#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
long long array[1000009];
int main(){
	array[1]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<=1000000;i++){
		array[i] = (i*array[i-1])%mod;
	}
	for(int i=2;i<=1000000;i++){
		array[i] = (array[i-1]+array[i])%mod;
	}
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int a,n;
		cin>>a>>n;
		long long ans;
		if(a>1)
		ans = array[n]-array[a-1];
		else  ans = array[n];
		ans = (ans + mod)%mod;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
 
}
